Html:
hi,

i'm trying to display custom document properties from a word document on a task panel so they can be easily edited.

some help in the right direction would be great, it's now done by loading them in a form, and all works fine, but i think it's nicer to have them on a task panel on the side.

thanks.

what have you tried?
What is causing you problems?
it's fairly straight forward process?

FYI, this feature already exist.... built in to word, I believe....
